page.title: 05School Begins.
page.content: Everybody was in school because it was raining. At 9.00 a.m.the bell went for the start of school. We all sat down and Mr. Owen came in.We usually have a 3 minute table test but today we didn't. We all began our Nelson Spelling (which we have every Tuesday).While we did our work Mr. Owen called out the registers. At 9.20 we went into assembly.In assembly we sing hymns,Mr. Bennion talks to us and we have prayers. After assembly we went back into class and finished our spelling work. At 10.30 we have break until 10.45. After break we did maths. Today we looked at triangles. At 12.00 we went for lunch which was fish,chips and peas. We had jam tart for pudding.After lunch we have break until 1.15 p.m.
